content: Joël Riou has marked this topic as unresolved.

In PR #14526, I show that pullback_cones can be dualised into pushout_cocones, and other similar results. The intent is to use this later to get dualisation results for is_pushout and is_pullback (defined in category_theory/limits/shapes/comm_sq.lean); these shall be useful later when developing homotopical algebra.
